description:
To learn for free on Brilliant (today's sponsor), go to https://brilliant.org/theplainbagel. Brilliant’s also giving viewers 20% off an annual Premium subscription, which gives you unlimited daily access to everything on Brilliant!

02:14 - Why Investors Buy Gold
04:10 - Why Gold's Rallying
08:34 - The Debasement Trade
09:47 - Considerations
13:27 - Gold's Questionable Price Stability
16:11 - Sponsor

Gold's price has been skyrocketing, with murmurings of a great "debasement trade" driving returns. Today we'll dive into what's driving performance, and the overall trends around gold.

If you'd like to support the channel, you can do so at https://www.patreon.com/c/ThePlainBagel :)

title: The 2025 Gold Rush - "Debasement Trade" or FOMO?
